meanings.definition: The final page of a book.
meanings.sent1: I always enjoy looking at the endleaf of a book to see if there are any interesting illustrations.
meanings.sent2: The endleaf of the novel had a beautiful quote that stuck with me.
meanings.sent3: The endleaf of the book seemed to be waving goodbye to the story.
meanings.sent4: As I reached the endleaf, it felt like closing the door on a wonderful adventure.
meanings.sent5: The endleaf was like a silent storyteller, hinting at the tale within.

meanings.definition: A leaf at the beginning or end of a book.
meanings.sent1: The endleaf at the start of the book had a map of the fictional world.
meanings.sent2: I found a pressed flower hidden in the endleaf of the old book.
meanings.sent3: The endleaf at the back of the book was like a secret message waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent4: The endleaf was like a bookmark, holding the place where the story began.
meanings.sent5: The endleaf was like a quiet introduction to the adventure that awaited within the pages.
